basics.name: Alena Stasevich
basics.summary: QA engineer with 7+ years experience in manual testing of multi-module security software (Desktop&Web apps)

certificates.title: Software Testing: Preparation for ISTQB Foundation certification
Jira: managing tasks on electronic boards
Software Testing: Postman for API testing

expirience.summary: Complex endpoint data protection solution with such functions as Access Control, Application Control, Audit, Data Analysis, Encryption, Data Loss Prevention, Content Analysis&Filter, Secure Erase
responsibilities: Use of Azure Devops bug tracking tool for prioritizing and reporting defects
Creating, editing and executing test cases
Using debugging tools to discover defects reasons

expirience.summary: Cybersecurity solution for critical infrastructure, that allows to implement a Defense in Depth security approach: protecting networks and endpoints in OT/IT production ecosystem, responding quickly to threats and complying with regulations.

recommendations.reference: I worked with Elena Stasevich as a support engineer for several years. I have always found her to be knowledgeable and helpful: excellent communication, clarification of any details and humorous to boot. Working with her has always been fruitful and - not to be underestimated - entertaining. Summa summarum: Elena top!
recommendations.name: Ruediger Waehling

recommendations.reference: I worked with Elena for several years. She is a perfect team member, has a good knowledge in a security scope. Elena has good communication skills, also has an ability to self-learning and work in a deadline mode. She always tries to find a new way to test a product, goes into details.
recommendations.name: Ekaterina Suvorova
